Title: Episode #4.1
Writer: Chris Ryan (based on the book by), Simon Burke, Tim Vaughan, Michael J. Bassett
Actors: Philip Winchester, Sullivan Stapleton, Rhona Mitra, Robson Green
Plot: A Section 20 operation in the Beqaa Valley goes badly resulting in Baxter's death. Stonebridge and Scott are enjoying a well-deserved vacation. Recalled to duty, they team up with Kim Martinez to track and capture the killer in Colombia.
